thread.title: Donald Trump, brash New Yorker, picks up Southern campaign
thread.title_full: Donald Trump, brash New Yorker, picks up Southern campaign - San Francisco Chronicle

author: Bill Barrow, Associated Press
title: Donald Trump, brash New Yorker, picks up Southern campaign
text: Photo: John Locher, AP In this Oct. 8, 2015, photo Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump speaks at a rally in Las Vegas. Trump is expanding his paid campaign staff into several Southern states that will be key to selecting the Republican presidential nominee. Trump’s advisers say it’s a sign he’s committed to a long race, despite suggestions he’s reconsidering his bid. In this Oct. 8, 2015, photo Republican presidential candidate... ATLANTA (AP) — Donald Trump is a brash New Yorker who knows the path to the Republican presidential nomination runs through a swath of Southern states where residents pride themselves on graciousness and gentility. In this Oct. 8, 2015, photo Republican presidential candidate Donald Trump speaks at a rally in Las Vegas. Trump is expanding his paid campaign staff into several Southern states that will be key to selecting the Republican presidential nominee. Trump’s advisers say it’s a sign he’s committed to a long race, despite suggestions he’s reconsidering his bid. In this Oct. 8, 2015, photo Republican presidential candidate... ATLANTA (AP) — Donald Trump is a brash New Yorker who knows the path to the Republican presidential nomination runs through a swath of Southern states where residents pride themselves on graciousness and gentility.
